sentences.en: Alexander Anichkin is a foreign correspondent who was educated in Moscow and now lives in Britain.
sentences.cn: 曾在莫斯读书、目前住在英国的亚历山大·阿尼奇金是一位驻外记者.

sentences.en: Ambassador Thompson's cables from Moscow reported Khrushchev's unusual preoc cupation with Cuba.
sentences.cn: 汤普森大使从莫斯科来报告了赫鲁晓夫对古巴问题超乎寻常的注意.

sentences.en: Does $ CIVNAME 1's arrogance know no bounds ? Why do your troops threaten Moscow?
sentences.cn: 难道$CIVNAME1傲慢无礼到这样的地步 吗 ?你的军队竟然有胆威胁莫斯科?

sentences.en: It is thought that the 1980 Moscow Village cost around 200 000 000 to build.
sentences.cn: 1932年洛衫矶奥运会首次兴建奥运村,现已成为惯例.

sentences.en: Last year Jiri Jaro? ik joined from CSKA Moscow .
sentences.cn: 去年加盟的是CSKA的 亚罗西克.

sentences.en: Many of them are coming to Moscow from quite far away for an opportunity to have this kind of educational experience.
sentences.cn: 为了这样一个有教育意义的体验，他们中的很多人都是从很远的地方赶到莫斯科来的。

sentences.en: Moscow is fourth with average room rates at $ 218 per night - down 52 % since last year.
sentences.cn: 莫斯科排在第四(有点无法想象),均价218美元每晚 —— 比起去年下降52%.

sentences.en: Moscow recently announced that capital flight last year increased to $ 25 billion.
sentences.cn: 莫斯科最近宣布,去年资本外流增至250亿美元.

sentences.en: Most Moscow - based reporters went seldom , if at all, and then only in daylight and well - guarded.
sentences.cn: 俄国记者裹足不前, 或有勇者全副武装 、 白日“到此一游”.

sentences.en: Renaissance Capital, the Moscow investment bank, estimates banks'hard currency stash at $ 110 bn.
sentences.cn: 莫斯科的投资银行资本复兴公司(RenaissanceCapital)估计,各银行的硬通货储备为1100亿美元.

sentences.en: Soon Ho was roaming the earth a covert agent for Moscow.
sentences.cn: 不久之后,胡志明以墨思科秘密特使的身分游走世界各地.

sentences.en: Why Jerusalem , and not London, Beijing, New York, Rome or Moscow?
sentences.cn: 为什么是耶路撒冷, 而不是伦敦 、 北京或纽约 呢 ?
